pageContent:
Shiva Korrapati | korrapatishiva9@gmail.com | Mobile# 3176743822 
 
 
SUMMARY 
• 6+ years of experience in ETL development, data analysis and Business Intelligence tools 
• Strong contributor in complex Data Warehousing and Business Intelligence project implementations using 
KALIDO DIW, Informatica 10.4/10.2 Power center client tools like Mapping Designer, Repository manager, 
Workflow  Manager/Monitor  and  Repository  Server  manager, Informatica  B2B  data  Transformation,  SQL 
Server Integration Services, SQL Server Reporting Services, MicroStrategy and Tableau 
• Proficient in working with relational databases such as Oracle 12c, SQL Server 2016/2012 and Teradata. 
• Proficient in PL/SQL Programming and in using Stored procedures, Functions, SQL tuning, and object 
creations. 
• Experienced in working with complex Informatica designer transformations such as rank, joiner, expression,

creations. 
• Experienced in working with complex Informatica designer transformations such as rank, joiner, expression, 
java, lookup (connected and unconnected), aggregator, sequence generator, update strategy, normalizer, 
sorter  
• Experienced  in  working  with Informatica  data  transformation  studio  components  like  serializers,  parser, 
mappers and streamers in data transformation studio for conversion of XML file to other formats 
• Experienced in  designing  Informatica  mappings  using  Informatica  B2B  data transformation  studio  to 
transform unstructured to structured data 
• Created  Java  code  snippets  within  the PowerCenter designer based  on  the  required  transformation 
behavior.  
• Experienced in  working  and  maintaining  warehouse  built  with  Kalido  Business  Information  Modeler  and 
loading the data using Kalido DIW 
• Proficient in developing methods to identify data anomalies and broken business rules within operational

loading the data using Kalido DIW 
• Proficient in developing methods to identify data anomalies and broken business rules within operational 
and transactional data systems, data integrity solutions and data cleanup processes 
• Proficient in database  and data  warehouse  development such  as replication,  staging,  ETL, partitioning, 
change data capture, scheduling tools, cubes and datamart 
• Experienced   in   designing,   updating and   administering the   metadata   of datamarts, while keeping 
descriptions of data consistent and reliable across multiple projects and databases 
• Structured platforms to establish base data for business reporting and other analytical frameworks 
• Experienced in  working   with  dashboard   and   report   development   using Visual Studio,   MS   Excel, 
MicroStrategy and Tableau 
• Worked on the converting SSIS packages to informatica workflows.

MicroStrategy and Tableau 
• Worked on the converting SSIS packages to informatica workflows. 
• Proficient  in performing  root  cause  analysis  on  internal  and  external  data  processes to address specific 
business questions and identify opportunities for improvement 
• Experienced in health care domain like Medicare, Medicaid and CHIP data within HIPPA regulations  
• Experience in Integrating Salesforce, 3M Person Focused Preventable [PFP], 3M Potentially Preventable 
Readmissions [PPR] Systems, HealthRules Care Manager, MedInsight Analytical Platform data and HEDIS 
(Healthcare  Effectiveness  Data  and  Information  Set) using  Informatica  PowerCenter  within  the  existing 
platform 
• Experienced in  analyzing pharmacy,  Medicare,  Medicaid  and  CHIP  data,  including various national 
healthcare coding standards like ICD-10-CM diagnosis codes, ICD-10-PCS procedure codes

• Experienced in  analyzing pharmacy,  Medicare,  Medicaid  and  CHIP  data,  including various national 
healthcare coding standards like ICD-10-CM diagnosis codes, ICD-10-PCS procedure codes 
• Strong  involvement  in analysis,  design,  implementation,  testing,  integration  and  maintenance  phases  of 
SDLC 
• Possess strong written and communication skills, multitasking ability, decision making & time management 
skills and flexible work schedule

TECHNICAL SKILLS 
Languages SQL, PL/SQL 
Databases MYSQL, Oracle 12c/11g, SQL Server 2016/2014, Teradata 
Tools and Packages SQL Server Management Studio, SQL Developer, TOAD 
Data Warehousing/ ETL  Informatica PowerCenter, Informatica Developer, Informatica Data  
Quality (IDQ), Kalido DIW & BIM, SSIS 
Business Intelligence SSRS, Tableau, SharePoint, Power BI, MicroStrategy 
IDE VS Code, Eclipse, IntelliJ Idea 
Software Development Models Agile, Waterfall 
Other Tools JIRA, Confluence 
 
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE 
ETL Developer, Health Partners Plans, Philadelphia, PA                 June 2018 – Present  
• Design and develop datamarts, ETL database applications to address and support business analytical and 
reporting requirements 
• Create    ETL interfaces to    process    and    analyze healthcare datasets like memberships, 
medical/pharmacy/dental/vision claims and lab data from providers and vendors

• Create    ETL interfaces to    process    and    analyze healthcare datasets like memberships, 
medical/pharmacy/dental/vision claims and lab data from providers and vendors 
• Develop complex ETL processes to perform full and incremental load of source data to staging tables using 
Informatica Power Center Designer, SQL and Windows batch scripts 
• Create ETL processes using B2B Data transformations for various flat files, XML, JSON, PDF, Excel files 
and SQL tables 
• Develop Informatica   mappings,   transformations,   reusable   objects   by   using   mapping   designer, 
transformation developer and mapplet designer in Informatica PowerCenter 
• Update slowly changing dimension (SCD) tables by using SCD Type 1 and Type 2 mappings 
• Develop enhanced mappings and Informatica task schedules as per evolving business requirements 
• Create and update stored procedures, functions, views, triggers and complex SQL queries using SQL server

• Create and update stored procedures, functions, views, triggers and complex SQL queries using SQL server 
• Create  ETL  processes that  handle  large  volumes  of  data  to  create  business  reports for  claims, 
memberships, financials, call center and other business areas 
• Create IDQ plans and incorporated them as mapplets in Informatica power center 
• Worked in creating PL/SQL scripts that involve Bulk Inserts, Multi Table Inserts and dynamic SQL for DML 
operations. 
• Extensive SQL, PL/SQL refactoring - SQL performance tuning using Query optimizer, execution plans and 
indexes. 
• Design  and  develop datamart for Rewards  Programs, HEDIS  (Healthcare  Effectiveness  Data  and 
Information Set), National Healthcare coding standards for ICD-10 (International Classification of Diseases, 
10
th
 Edition), NDC (National  Drug  Codes), CPT (Current  Procedure  Terminology), HCPCS  (Health  Care

10
th
 Edition), NDC (National  Drug  Codes), CPT (Current  Procedure  Terminology), HCPCS  (Health  Care 
Common  Procedure  Coding  System), CDT  (Code  on  Dental  Procedures  and  Nomenclatures) within  the 
Enterprise Data Warehouse 
• Work with Genesys Customer Interaction Center (CIC) data and developed an Inhouse Call Center Data 
Warehouse to store and update data incrementally 
• Worked on the implementation of Master Data Management (MDM) using Health Care Accelerator Model 
to generate golden records from providers, members and other reference data 
• Created loading processes to feed the data into the staging tables for the MDM load process.

• Created SCD type 2 load process within the Enterprise Data Warehouse (EDW) to load the MDM golden 
record and created views to make this available to users. 
• Integrated Salesforce, 3M Person Focused Preventable [PFP], 3M Potentially Preventable Readmissions 
[PPR]  Systems, HealthRules  Care  Manager and  MedInsight  Analytical  Platform data  using  Informatica 
PowerCenter within the existing platform 
• Design warehouse dashboards, reports with charts, tables, matrices, parameterized reports, sub reports, 
drill through and drill down reports using SQL Server Reporting Services (SSRS) 
• Work closely with business users to identify various KPI’s and design solutions to enhance the business 
insights and decision making 
• Create design documentations, test cases for new and existing ETL applications 
 
ETL Developer, Walden Technology Professionals, Indianapolis, IN               June 2017 – June 2018

• Create design documentations, test cases for new and existing ETL applications 
 
ETL Developer, Walden Technology Professionals, Indianapolis, IN               June 2017 – June 2018 
 
• Analyzed business needs, created and developed new functionality for real time data integration 
• Enhanced performance for Informatica sessions that use large data files by using partitions, increasing block 
size, data cache size and target-based commit interval 
• Designed and developed mappings using Informatica/SQL processes to load data into tables and flat files 
• Developed complex mappings/sessions using Informatica Power Center 
• Used utilities like SQL Loader, Informatica PowerCenter to load bulk data 
• Created ETL processes to extract data from direct flat files and indirect flat files 
• Created  mappings  using  transformations  like  the  aggregator,  sorter, expression,  filter,  router,  XML

generator, HTML and session tasks like the command task, email task, decision task and event wait task 
• Implemented Type  1  and  Type  2 SCD (Slowly  Changing Dimensions) and  Change  Data  Capture (CDC) 
logics 
• Created database connections (ODBC) for sources and targets in Informatica PowerCenter 
• Created batch scripts in DOS for actions that automate ETL processes and schedule loads at the required 
frequency 
• Maintained daily and weekly process that loads data to Enterprise Data Warehouse 
• Created optimal solutions using performance and database tuning methods such as indexes, partitioning, 
materialized views, functions, execution plan and Informatica debugger 
• Worked on MS Visio and source control tools to document requirements 
• Worked with BI teams in developing interactive dashboards that visually describe business status, strengths

• Worked on MS Visio and source control tools to document requirements 
• Worked with BI teams in developing interactive dashboards that visually describe business status, strengths 
& weaknesses, potentials etc. using Tableau 
• Evaluated database performance and performed tuning, backup, restoration and disaster recovery 
• Designed ETL mapping documents for dev team implementations 
System Analyst, Mythriis Consulting Pvt Ltd, Hyderabad, India                                  Jan 2015 – Jan 2016 
 
• Created SQL scripts to generate tables and relationships based on the finalized ER diagrams 
• Created various schema objects like views, stored procedures, user defined functions, triggers and indexes 
• Identified and created various facts and dimension tables based on warehouse designs. 
• Analyzed and tuned SQL queries using show plan and execution plan 
• Created processes for database integrity check, updating database statistics and audit process to log ETL’s

• Analyzed and tuned SQL queries using show plan and execution plan 
• Created processes for database integrity check, updating database statistics and audit process to log ETL’s 
within the warehouse 
• Automated  various  SQL  scripts  and  bulk  load  processes using  windows  batch  script  to  load  data  from 
different data sources 
• Created scheduled jobs for performing database maintenance tasks like de-fragmentation, re-indexing, and 
recompiling 
• Responsible for maintaining and successful running of the scheduled packages

• Provided support for functional, performance testing and documenting these processes along with Source 
to Target mappings, flow charts and source codes. 
• Created database documentation for tables, column dictionaries and other reference material
